Enum CodecType

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CodecType>

    public enum CodecType
extends java.lang.Enum<CodecType>
    This enum defines encoding type of request or response

      • fromAcceptHeader

        public static CodecType fromAcceptHeader(java.lang.String accept,

        Parameters:
